post_info.post_title: Inmate Beer Runs? Is this a problem?

They're being charged with escaping, and bringing booze to a jail. They're clearly guilty of the second, but how can you call it escaping when they come back? At best they're guilty of popping out for a bit, which I'd call a misdemeanor.

If ever there was a jailhouse I would want to be in, that would be it... emoticon_xdonno 
 
 Maybe they've been mistreated in some way and the ACLU forced the system to relieve restraints....? emoticon_frazzled 
 
 Or maybe they used the Word of God to break free like the apostle Paul did????
 
Two of the inmates walked out through a fire exit, leaving the door propped open with a Bible...

 
 Not!

I guess it takes all kinds....you know mixing the Word of God and beer....sounds like some of them Baptist fellowships ... (:p just joking...for anybody that may be offended...I'm Baptist too...laugh a little!)
